name: Who Killed Charlie and Ginger
description:
A homage to the early 2010s era of Slender inspired indie horror games. You play as Cackling Pumpkins as he wonders through the Susquehanna Park to find tapes to clear his name of the murder or Charlie & Ginger. But now he's being hunted by a threat from 2010. The Hobo returns to chase him down. Find the tapes and escape alive!

Credits from JenerikEt:

Game concept, development-co-production, testing, video production, and 2D artwork by Cackling Pumpkins @CacklingPumpkins on Twitter

Devlopment-co-production, design, and programming by Jenerik Entertainment @JenerikEt on Twitter & Instagram

Grass and flower detail textures by zisongbr from OpenGameArt, released under GPL 2.0

Horror ambient music by Vinrax, released under CC-BY 3.0, GPL 3.0, and GPL 2.0

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html

Everything else is public domain, however all of it or almost all of it was found on opengameart.org

(Normally I like to credit people regardless, but I had a month to make this and crediting is a bit of brainwork in itself)
